title: Director Shizuku!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>Actually.... There’s something I’ve been keeping a secret from everyone. So you see....--<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You finally talked to us. We’ve been waiting for a long time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank you for believing in us.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Everyone....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Cuuuut!! That’s good, very good! That was the best~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Really? Should we keep going like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Everyone will be so surprised when we do this mid-song play next live~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>This will be the best play ever! It’ll be so good that I want to also do it as part of the Osaka Troupe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, leader! Please train us more~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata also wants to get more into the role~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Leave it to me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
